snippet.title: MouseCraft - Trailer (Windows, Mac, Linux, PS4, PS3, PS Vita)
snippet.description:
We are really pleased to announce that MouseCraft will launch simultaneously on the 8th of July for PlayStation 4, PlayStation 3, PlayStation Vita,  PC, Mac and Linux.

The game is currently available on Steam Early Access: http://store.steampowered.com/app/252750 and will be available in Cross-Buy for all PlayStation platforms.
